channel.title: How do i make a 2h weapon 1h?
channel.description: im using butterscape source and client, i wanna make a godsword 1h, i changed it in class8.java and it's now a edited d skimmy, but it isnt 1h, i've taken the ID out of item.java under the "itemTwoHanded = 15914, true;" but it still hasnt worked...is there something else i need to do or is it just not possible...?

item.title: How do i make a 2h weapon 1h?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

kk thx got it to work…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a 2h weapon 1h?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

After you’ve removed the 2h, replace what you removed and put it under a 1h method.
